item.description:
One more time for Mt. Hood. Their special is $29 plus $18 for cart if riding. I've reserved 4 T times beginning at 1:15 pm.

From their website ..... 10 miles from the Zakim Bridge, you'd think you're in the heart of Vermont. Generous fairways, smallish greens and natural topography make Mount Hood a legacy of the classic era of golf design. While the course is playable and rewarding to golfers of all abilities, 8 of 18 tees are dramatically elevated allowing soaring tee shots as well as commanding views from Boston to New Hampshire.

I'll collect the customary $1 fee for the website.
If needed, I can be reached at 339-224-1377
Hope to see you there, Cindi
item.how_to_find_us: around the club house 15 minutes to T time

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Mt. Hood Golf Course, Melrose, MA
